titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-352, by Mrs. Myrick.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 125.

bill.summary: 11/6/2003--Reported to House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII with respect to a reported resolution providing for consideration or disposition of the conference report on H.R. 1588 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2004).
